name: updateIssueTypeScheme
description:
Updates an issue type scheme.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

issueTypeSchemeId.description: The ID of the issue type scheme.

IssueTypeSchemeUpdateDetails.description: Details of the name, description, and default issue type for an issue type scheme.

defaultIssueTypeId.description: The ID of the default issue type of the issue type scheme.

description.description: The description of the issue type scheme. The maximum length is 4000 characters.

name.description: The name of the issue type scheme. The name must be unique. The maximum length is 255 characters.
